name: NBCNews
text: The US Justice Dept. is suing Walmart for its alleged role in fueling the US opioid crisis by inadequately screening thousands of prescriptions and ignoring repeated warnings from its own pharmacists, the lawsuit says. https://t.co/ejFkjRfiW1

name: NBCNews
text: A holiday celebration at a church in a small town in North Carolina has led to 97 Covid-19 cases as of Tuesday morning, and is expected to grow in the coming days, a health official says. https://t.co/UzjQmSKJ6M

text:
